sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: A low - sensitivity probe was purchased to cope with the ore.
sentences.cn: 低灵敏度的探测器用于测量岩心.

sentences.en: An instrument used to measure tactile sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 触觉测量计用来测量触觉的一种装置.

sentences.en: Antigen density on the tumor cell surface influences the cytotoxic sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 瘤细胞表面的抗原密度影响细胞毒的敏感性.

sentences.en: Due to the obvious sensitivity of the issue he would not divulge any details.
sentences.cn: 由于该问题明显非常敏感，他不会透露任何细节。

sentences.en: Each user should have access to a security level based upon the level of data sensitivity he or she can see.
sentences.cn: 根据用户可以看到的数据的敏感性级别，每个用户都应该可以访问某个安全级别。

sentences.en: He appeared to be treating the potentially explosive situation with some sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 他似乎正小心地应对可能一触即发的局势。

sentences.en: He's a mixture of anger and sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 他气量小又太敏感。

sentences.en: Hearing sensitivity declines with age.
sentences.cn: 听觉因年老而衰退.

sentences.en: It’s a matter of great political sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 这件事在政治上非常敏感。

sentences.en: Lewis emerges as a composer of distinction and sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯作为一位悟性很高的优秀作曲家崭露头角。

sentences.en: racial sensitivities
sentences.cn: 种族（问题）的敏感性

sentences.en: sensitivity to the needs of children
sentences.cn: 体察孩子们的需要

sentences.en: Such is the sensitivity of the information that only two people are allowed to know it.
sentences.cn: 这信息极为敏感,只允许两个人知道.

sentences.en: The authentication mode you choose for your environment will be determined by the level of sensitivity of your data.
sentences.cn: 应该为您的环境选择什么样的身份验证模式，这是由数据的敏感级别来决定的。

sentences.en: The higher - order terms arise from nonlinearities and cross - axis sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 高次项是由外线性和轴间耦合灵敏度所产生的.

sentences.en: The sensitivity of the detector can be increased.
sentences.cn: 这种探测器的灵敏度还可以提高。

sentences.en: The sensitivity of the test meets WHO standards for detecting the toxin in drinking water.
sentences.cn: 这种测试的灵敏度满足了世界卫生组织探测饮用水毒物的标准。

sentences.en: The spectral sensitivity of various cells is very different.
sentences.cn: 各种光电管的分光灵敏度是很不相同的.

sentences.en: These are modern materials having greater uniformity and higher optical sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 这些是均质性更好、光学灵敏度更高的现代材料.

sentences.en: This example illustrates the great sensitivity of the radioactivity method.
sentences.cn: 这个例子说明了放射性方法很灵敏.

words.tran_cn: 明智的；明显的；意识到的；通晓事理的
敏感的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的
可感觉到的东西；敏感的人

phrases.tran_cn: 切口灵敏度；缺口灵感度
压感，压力灵敏度；声压灵敏度
灵敏度分析；敏感性分析
敏感性测试；灵敏度试验
温度灵敏度，温度灵敏度系数；温度感受性

trans.tran_cn: 敏感，感受性，仪器等的)灵敏性，[摄]感光度
trans.tran_en: when a situation or subject needs to be dealt with carefully because it is secret or may offend people
